Uses of Class
jota.error.BaseException

  • Packages that use BaseException 
    Package Description
    jota  
    jota.error  

    • Uses of BaseException in jota

      Methods in jota that throw BaseException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Transaction> IotaAPI.promoteTransaction(String tail, int depth, int minWeightMagnitude, Bundle bundle)
      Attempts to promote a transaction using a provided bundle and, if successful, returns the promoting Transactions.

    • Uses of BaseException in jota.error

      Subclasses of BaseException in jota.error 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArgumentException
      This exception occurs when an invalid argument is provided.
      class  NotPromotableException
      This exception occurs as part of a `promoteTransaction` call if the transaction is not promotable.
